clinical_study.brief_title: FMRI Assessment After Radiofrequency in Trigeminal Neuralgia
clinical_study.official_title: Brain Activity Assessment by Functional MRI Before, After Radiofrequency of Gasserian Ganglia in Patient With Trigeminal Neuralgia

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the brain activations related to TN, using fMRI, and to evaluate changes in these activations following the application of pulsed and thermal Radiofrequency lesioning to the gasserien ganglion.

arm_group.description: sensory stimulation will be carried out at 50 Hz. The definitive position of the electrode will be verified by inducing paresthesia with sensory stimulation between 0.1-0.3 V in the affected painful area, then pulsed radiofrequency will be applied for 10 patients for 10 mins

sensory stimulation will be carried out at 50 Hz. The definitive position of the electrode will be verified by inducing paresthesia with sensory stimulation between 0.1-0.3 V in the affected painful area, then Thermal lesion will be applied for 10 patients for 2 cycles of 90 seconds

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 20 - 65 years
- Primary trigeminal neuralgia
- Maxillary and/or mandibular affection only
- Failure of medical treatment
Exclusion Criteria:
- 2ry trigeminal neuralgia
- Recurrent trigeminal neuralgia
- Ophthalmic branch affection
- Contraindication for intervention (sepsis, coagulopathy, infection at entery point, local anesthetic allergy,â€¦)
- Pregnancy
